changes: Fixed JSON parsing error during deployment/rollback
Added proper HTTP status code checking before JSON parsing
Added content-type validation for API responses
Improved error messages for authentication failures
Prevents 'Unexpected token' errors when session expires
Fixed versions page showing 'Deployed' status after bucket cleared
Clear Deploy Bucket now clears version history cache
Ensures deployed status reflects actual bucket contents
Prevents stale cache from showing incorrect deployment status
Added comprehensive diagnostic tools
Created check-status.sh for quick system health checks
Created diagnose-online.sh for detailed configuration analysis
Created fix-and-verify.sh for automated fixes and verification
All diagnostic tools with color-coded output and scoring system
CRITICAL FIX: Fixed Clear Deploy Bucket stuck at 'Initializing...'
Added Socket.IO initialization in DeploymentManager constructor
this.socket was undefined causing event listeners to fail
Progress events now properly received from backend
CRITICAL FIX: Fixed Clear Deploy Bucket modal hanging issue
Removed premature Socket.IO event handler cleanup from finally block
Moved cleanup logic into progress handler callbacks (complete/error phases)
Added fallback mechanism if Socket.IO events fail to update progress
Progress modal now properly closes after bucket clearing completes
Improved event handler lifecycle management with named functions
CRITICAL FIX: Fixed deployment not uploading files to bucket
Corrected undefined targetPrefix variable causing empty deployments
Now properly iterates through targetPrefixes array
Files are now correctly uploaded to game directories
Multi-target deployment now works for resource artifacts
Added real-time progress display for Clear Deploy Bucket operation
Shows progress modal with percentage and file count
Socket.IO integration for live progress updates
Displays scanning, deleting, and completion phases
Enhanced user experience with visual feedback during bucket clearing
